word: "All power is given unto me in heaven and in earth. Go ye therefore, and teach all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Ghost." "Go ye into all the world," He said, "and preach the gospel to every creature," "Teaching them to observe all things whatsoever I have commanded you; and, lo, I am with you alway, even unto the end of the world."
